kr.ac.kaist.team888.util

Class JsonLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.ac.kaist.team888.util.JsonLoader

  • public class JsonLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Make data with external json file.

    This class for convert json file using gson library.

      • getLocatorData

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray getLocatorData(java.lang.String type,
                                                java.lang.String medial)
        Returns a base locator data for the given letter type.

        Hangul letters are grouped into two general types: type-2 and type-3. Type-2 is for letters consisting of an initial and a medial, while type-3 includes a final also. Each general type is separated with the medials. Thus, there are 42 letter types.

        Parameters:
        type - the general type ("type2" or "type3").
        medial - the name of the medial character such as "Ah".
        Returns:
        a base locator data.
